content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To organize your work from home as successful as possible, it is important to reduce the number of external distractions. Create a good work schedule and clearly communicate to others when you are busy and unable to perform other tasks. Turn off the television and avoid or limit the number of visits to social networks thus reducing the number of distractions and increasing productivity.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Planning contributes to our sense of control. Set-up a working plan that you can adjust around your family responsibilities. Be gentle with yourself even if you don’t complete all the tasks on your list or your schedule doesn’t go according to plan.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
